text: 3|52|geu hu yesuga geudeullobuteo bulsin-eul injihaess-eul ttae geuga malhagil “hananim-eul wihaeseo naleul dowajul jadeul-eun nugu-inga?” hawaliyun(jejadeul)i malhagil “ulideul-i hananim-eul wihae dobneun jadeul-ibnida. ulideul-eun hananim-eul mid-eoss-eumyeo, dangsinkkeseo ulideul-i museullim(bogjonghaneun ja)im-eul jeung-eonhae jusibsio.”
